Articles.Content:
Well, the title is self-explanatory. You are reentering in Kerbin's atmosphere wit your SSTO, but you don't know what will happen! Will your spaceplane put his nose towards the Sun? Or will it deep into the ground? Who knows! No more random attempts to balance your spacecraft by moving fuel around, what you'll need is just this plugin!

It would be cool, wouldn't?

So, if there is a modder who is willing to take the challenge... Just do it!

Edited August 4, 2015 by Alpha188
